attributes.action: save the trees on Gilnow Road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Campaign to stop Bolton Council cutting down 33 lime trees which form a beautiful green avenue between Queens Park and Heaton Cemetery, Bolton

rejection.details: This is a matter for local government. I suggest thatyou contact your local MP: http://www.parliament.uk/mpslordsandoffices/mps_and_lords/alcm.cfm
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
